item.title: Tap Capslock for Escape, Hold for Control
item.description: About a month ago I picked up a Dygma raise1: a split, ergonomic keyboard with programable firmware. At some point I’d like to write more about my foray into mechanical, and more specifically split board keebs but for now the most important part is that the Raise has a programmable firmware. Beyond simple rebinds it also allows for dual function keys, layers, and QMK tap dance2 like contextually sensitive bindings.
